(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (ADVP (RB never))
      (VP (VBN considered)
        (PP
          (ADVP
            (NP (DT this) (NN question))
            (IN before))
          (IN until)
          (NP (RB now)))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(considered-4, I-1)
aux(considered-4, have-2)
neg(considered-4, never-3)
root(ROOT-0, considered-4)
det(question-6, this-5)
npadvmod(before-7, question-6)
advmod(until-8, before-7)
prep(considered-4, until-8)
pobj(until-8, now-9)


(ROOT
  (S
    (ADVP (RB Maybe))
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (VBP have) (RB n't)
      (ADVP (RB too)))
    (. .)))


advmod(have-3, Maybe-1)
nsubj(have-3, you-2)
root(ROOT-0, have-3)
neg(have-3, n't-4)
advmod(have-3, too-5)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP (DT the) (NN question)))
    (: :)))


nsubj(question-4, This-1)
cop(question-4, is-2)
det(question-4, the-3)
root(ROOT-0, question-4)


(ROOT
  (SBARQ
    (WHADVP (WRB How))
    (SQ (MD should)
      (NP (NNP Chendol))
      (VP (VB be)
        (VP (VBN taken))))
    (. ?)))

auxpass(taken-5, be-4)
root(ROOT-0, taken-5)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP (IN With)
      (NP
        (NP (JJ shaved) (NN ice))
        (PP
          (PP (IN like)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NN one))
              (PP (IN in)
                (NP (DT the) (NN picture)))))
          (CC or)
          (PP (IN as)
            (NP
              (NP (DT a) (NN soup-drink))
              (PP (IN with)
                (NP (JJ crushed) (NN ice))))))))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, With-1)
amod(ice-3, shaved-2)
pobj(With-1, ice-3)
prep(ice-3, like-4)
det(one-6, the-5)
pobj(like-4, one-6)
prep(one-6, in-7)
det(picture-9, the-8)
pobj(in-7, picture-9)
cc(like-4, or-10)
conj(like-4, as-11)
det(soup-drink-13, a-12)
pobj(as-11, soup-drink-13)
prep(soup-drink-13, with-14)
amod(ice-16, crushed-15)
pobj(with-14, ice-16)

  (SINV
    (S
      (S

      (RB all)

        (NP (PRP you))

            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB enjoy)))))))

    (NP
      (NP (DT the) (NN taste))
      (PP (IN of)
        (NP
          (NP (JJ cold) (NN coconut) (NN milk))

            (NP (NNP Gula) (NNP Melaka))))))
    (. .)))

                        (NP (DT the) (JJS best) (NN stuff))

    (. .)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP she))
    (ADVP (RB simply))
    (VP (VBD wanted)
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB create)
            (NP (NNS desserts))
            (SBAR (IN that)
              (S
                (NP (PRP she))
                (VP (VBD enjoyed)
                  (SBAR (IN as)
                    (S
                      (NP (DT a) (NN child))
                      (VP (VBP ie)
                        (NP (DT the) (JJ traditional) (NN way))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(wanted-3, she-1)
advmod(wanted-3, simply-2)
root(ROOT-0, wanted-3)
aux(create-5, to-4)
xcomp(wanted-3, create-5)
dobj(create-5, desserts-6)
mark(enjoyed-9, that-7)
nsubj(enjoyed-9, she-8)
ccomp(create-5, enjoyed-9)
mark(ie-13, as-10)
det(child-12, a-11)
nsubj(ie-13, child-12)
advcl(enjoyed-9, ie-13)
det(way-16, the-14)
amod(way-16, traditional-15)
dobj(ie-13, way-16)


(ROOT
  (S (IN So)
    (NP (PRP she))
    (VP (VBZ adds)
      (NP
        (NP
          (NP (JJ dried) (NNS persimmons)
            (CC and)
            (NN winter) (NN melon))
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP (PRP$ her) (NNP Cheng) (NNP Tng))))
        (CC and)
        (NP
          (NP (RB not) (DT any))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (JJ modern) (NN stuff))
              (PP (IN like)
                (NP (NN agar) (NN agar)
                  (CC or)
                  (NN jelly))))))))
    (. .)))


dep(adds-3, So-1)
nsubj(adds-3, she-2)
root(ROOT-0, adds-3)
amod(persimmons-5, dried-4)
dobj(adds-3, persimmons-5)
cc(persimmons-5, and-6)
nn(melon-8, winter-7)
conj(persimmons-5, melon-8)
prep(persimmons-5, in-9)
poss(Tng-12, her-10)
nn(Tng-12, Cheng-11)
pobj(in-9, Tng-12)
cc(persimmons-5, and-13)
neg(any-15, not-14)
conj(persimmons-5, any-15)
prep(any-15, of-16)
det(stuff-19, the-17)
amod(stuff-19, modern-18)
pobj(of-16, stuff-19)
prep(stuff-19, like-20)
nn(agar-22, agar-21)
pobj(like-20, agar-22)
cc(agar-22, or-23)
conj(agar-22, jelly-24)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADJP (RB Not) (JJ easy))
    (S
      (VP (TO to)
        (VP (VB find)
          (NP (JJ such) (NNP Cheng) (NNP Tng))
          (ADVP (RB nowadays)))))
    (. .)))


neg(easy-2, Not-1)
root(ROOT-0, easy-2)
aux(find-4, to-3)
dep(easy-2, find-4)
amod(Tng-7, such-5)
nn(Tng-7, Cheng-6)
dobj(find-4, Tng-7)
advmod(find-4, nowadays-8)


(ROOT
  (NP (NNP Best) (NNP Chendol)))


nn(Chendol-2, Best-1)
root(ROOT-0, Chendol-2)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP have)
      (VP (VBN eaten)
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP (NNS years)))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(eaten-3, I-1)
aux(eaten-3, have-2)
root(ROOT-0, eaten-3)
prep(eaten-3, in-4)
pobj(in-4, years-5)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB Make)
      (ADJP (JJ sure))
      (SBAR
        (WHADVP (WRB when))
        (S
          (NP (PRP you))
          (VP (VB order)
            (SBAR (IN that)
              (S
                (NP (PRP you))
                (VP (VBP stress)
                  (SBAR (IN that)
                    (S
                      (NP (PRP you))
                      (VP (VBP want)
                        (NP (DT the)
                          (ADJP (RB finely) (JJ shaved))
                          (NN ice))))))))))))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, Make-1)
acomp(Make-1, sure-2)
advmod(order-5, when-3)
nsubj(order-5, you-4)
advcl(Make-1, order-5)
mark(stress-8, that-6)
nsubj(stress-8, you-7)
ccomp(order-5, stress-8)
mark(want-11, that-9)
nsubj(want-11, you-10)
ccomp(stress-8, want-11)
det(ice-15, the-12)
advmod(shaved-14, finely-13)
amod(ice-15, shaved-14)
dobj(want-11, ice-15)


(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (PP
      (ADVP (RB Sometimes))
      (IN after)
      (NP (NN making) (NN cold) (NNP Cheng) (NNP Tng)))
    (, ,)))


advmod(after-2, Sometimes-1)
root(ROOT-0, after-2)
nn(Tng-6, making-3)
nn(Tng-6, cold-4)
nn(Tng-6, Cheng-5)
pobj(after-2, Tng-6)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP they))
    (VP (MD might)
      (VP (VB forget)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB set)
              (NP (DT the) (NN ice) (NN shaver))
              (PRT (RP back))
              (PP (TO to)
                (NP (NN fine))))))))
    (. !)))


nsubj(forget-3, they-1)
aux(forget-3, might-2)
root(ROOT-0, forget-3)
aux(set-5, to-4)
xcomp(forget-3, set-5)
det(shaver-8, the-6)
nn(shaver-8, ice-7)
dobj(set-5, shaver-8)
prt(set-5, back-9)
prep(set-5, to-10)
pobj(to-10, fine-11)
